Header: Teenâ€™s body recovered from Magalla Sea
Content: Body of the teen who drowned in Magalla Sea in Galle was recovered this morning. The Sri Lanka Navy and residents of the area launched a search after 16-year-old Chanaka Madushanka went missing, while he was vacating in Magalla, Galle with two other friends. Postmortem inquiries into the body will commence today.
